fullDescription.intro:
NCBI Gene. Example: ##Symbol##[GENE] 9606[taxid].
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: Entrez query. Use ##colname## to insert a value from the input table. e.g '##Gene.name##[Symbol] 9606[TID]'
limit number of results per query
